price: 35. Als gunst van Ons, aldus belonen Wij degene die dankbaar is.
arabic: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: niʿ'matan min ʿindinā kadhālika najzī man shakara
